class.name: DefaultMeasurementModel

javadoc.text: Default implementation of a {@link MeasurementModel} for the use with a {@link KalmanFilter}.
The measurement matrix, used to associate the measurement vector to the * internal state estimation vector.
Create a new {@link MeasurementModel}, taking double arrays as input parameters for the * respective measurement matrix and noise.
javadoc.throws: NullArgumentExceptionif any of the input matrices is {@code null}
NoDataExceptionif any row / column dimension of the input matrices is zero
DimensionMismatchExceptionif any of the input matrices is non-rectangular

javadoc.text: Create a new {@link MeasurementModel}, taking {@link RealMatrix} objects * as input parameters for the respective measurement matrix and noise.
